short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When clicked, this extension displays Rock Blaster, a game made by me!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When opened, this extension displays a window with the game Rock Blaster made specifically by Me! Although it requires patience, please wait up to a maximum of 5 seconds before trying to open it again, due to it having to load all of the scripts put into it!
